adept.common

Class SentimentMention

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.MentalStateMention
          • adept.common.SentimentMention

  • public class SentimentMention
extends MentalStateMention

    Represents a textual sentiment. This class has been newly introduced in the Adept API release v2.1.

    The sentiment mention arguments are restricted to the types EntityMention, RelationMention.Filler, RelationMention, and Integer.

    Instances of this class may be assigned as provenances to instances of type DocumentSentiment.
